description: Root file test fixtures from WoW CDN
source: Downloaded via cascette-py from Blizzard CDN mirrors

fixtures.notes: First 2 blocks truncated from full root file. V1 format: 12-byte block headers (content_flags first), interleaved ckey+hash per record.
First 3 blocks truncated from full root file. V2 block format: 17-byte block headers (locale_flags first, split content flags). header_size=24 includes 4 bytes padding beyond the base 20-byte struct.
